metadata.title: CVE-2024-52530 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: GNOME libsoup before 3.6.0 allows HTTP request smuggling in someconfigurations because '\0' characters at the end of header names areignored, i.e., a "Transfer-Encoding\0: chunked" header is treated the sameas a "Transfer-Encoding: chunked" header.

criterions.comment: libsoup2.4 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
